<title
    level="1"
    right="Item 10+"
    pfs="Standard"
>
[Potion of Stable Form](/Equipment.aspx?ID=1029)
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Abjuration" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=2" />
<trait label="Consumable" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=36" />
<trait label="Magical" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=103" />
<trait label="Potion" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=130" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Secrets of Magic](/Sources.aspx?ID=96) pg. 175 <sup>1.1</sup></row>

<row gap="medium">

**Usage** held in 1 hand

**Bulk** L
</row>

<row gap="medium">
<row gap="tiny"><row>**Activate**</row><actions string="Single Action" /><row>Interact</row></row>

 

 

 
</row>

</column>

---

This aromatic potion is brewed from the white flowers and black roots of the magical herb moly. When you drink this potion, it immediately attempts to counteract all hostile [transmutation](/Traits.aspx?ID=157) effects affecting you. For the next hour, you gain an item bonus against transmutation effects, which is greater against [polymorph](/Traits.aspx?ID=127) effects. If you roll a success against a polymorph effect during that time, you get a critical success instead.

**Bulk** L

</row>

---

The [counteract](/Rules.aspx?ID=371) level is 5, and the counteract check modifier is +17. The item bonus is +2, or +3 vs. polymorph.
